param.name: ppIReader
param.para: Pointer that receives a pointer to a metadata reader.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the metadata patterns associated with the metadata reader.

param.name: cbSize
param.para: The size, in bytes, of the pPattern buffer.

param.name: pPattern
param.para: Pointer that receives the metadata patterns.

param.name: pcCount
param.para: Pointer that receives the number of metadata patterns.

param.name: pcbActual
param.para: Pointer that receives the size, in bytes, needed to obtain the metadata patterns.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Determines if a stream contains a metadata item pattern.

param.name: guidContainerFormat
param.para: The container format of the metadata item.

param.name: pIStream
param.para: The stream to search for the metadata pattern.

param.name: pfMatches
param.para: Pointer that receives TRUE if the stream contains the pattern; otherwise, FALSE.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that provide basic information about the registered metadata reader.
